* '''New sustainability brands''' occur when a company creates an entire new brand name when they access a new product category.
* '''New sustainability brands''' occur when a company creates an entire new brand name when they access a new product category.

[[File:MSC ecolabel.png|thumb|right|MSC ecolabel as possible label for a sustainability brand in the seafood sector]]
 
To create a sustainability brand it is furthermore important to adopt the right channels for marketing according to Lauterborns five Cs. Advertising in this case can help to create awareness of the brand and thus form the new brand experience. <ref name="Belz_Peattie_2009"/> <ref name="R_Lauterborn_1990">Lauterborn,R (1990) 'New marketing litany: 4 Ps passÃ©; C-words take over', Advertising Age"</ref>
To create a sustainability brand it is furthermore important to adopt the right channels for marketing according to Lauterborns five Cs. Advertising in this case can help to create awareness of the brand and thus form the new brand experience. <ref name="Belz_Peattie_2009"/> <ref name="R_Lauterborn_1990">Lauterborn,R (1990) 'New marketing litany: 4 Ps passÃ©; C-words take over', Advertising Age"</ref>
Furthermore it is obligatory for Sustainability brands to obtain one ore more [[ecolabel]]s, leading to a higher influence on consumer behaviour and the perception of the brand. <ref name="Belz_Peattie_2009"/>
